Replies.Reply: No one would have believed in the early years of the21st century, that our world was being watched by intelligences greater than our own. That as men busied themselves about their various concerns, they observed and studied. Like the way a man with a microscope might scrutinize the creatures that swarm and multiply in a drop of water. With infinite complacency men went to and fro about the globe, confident of our empire over this world. Yet, across the gulf of space, intellects, vast and cool and unsympathetic regarded our plant with envious eyes. And slowly and surely, drew their plans against us.

From the moment the invaders arrived, breathed our air, ate and drank, they were doomed. They were undone, destroyed, after all of man's weapons and devices had failed, by the tiniest creatures that God and his wisdom, put upon this earth. At the toll of a billion deaths, man had earned his immunity, is right to survive among this planet's infinite organisms. And that right is ours against all challenges, for men do not live nor die in vein.
I need you back at 4:00 instead of 12:00 I got half of Korea coming in.
Tadesko can't move 40 containers in an hour. I need somebody who can do double picks.
Come on, I'm in a position here!
You know what your problem is?
No, no, no I can't. I'm on a 12 hour blow! Call Tadesko.   Camera follows them walking down the street.
I wish I could help you Sal. God damn union regulations.
Come on, you remember the union regulations, Sal.
Hey, this is one safe looking vehicle you got yourself here Tim. Congratulations.
There he is! You got a hug?
Really, I got it from here, okay?
You better get going if you want to beat the traffic, don't you think?
Would you close the door please? Now that that's my refrigerator.
Mary Ann, let me get this.

Replies.Reply: Believe it or not, I can handle it.

Just do your report. We don't send you to school so you can flunk out.

That why you act like such a dick?

To sleep. I work for a living.
Where'd you get it. Come here.
me to take that out for you?
Well, come here let me see it.

Replies.Reply: I meant order food! Where is Robbie?
In the springtime maybe. Not this time of year. Come on, we can see better from the back yard.
Oh, Come on. It's like the fourth of July.
Yeah, well it's not gonna hit there again because lighting doesn't strike twice in the same place.
Just checking things out. Just wait, wait there.
No. I meant... Rachel, please, just stop asking so many questions. Just wait here.
Did you see it? Did you... Were you near it?

I'm on my way to find out. Try umm...
I should of known you two were behind this.

It's the cars though. That's the thing.
We're leaving this house in 60 seconds.
... all the food from the refrigerator and the cupboard, put it in here.
I need you to get your suitcase...
The one that you brought, bring it to me, okay?
Can you do that for me, darling?
Shh, Shh, I can't tell you now. We...
Just get in the front seat Robbie.
I don't have time to expl....
GET IN MANNY OR YOU'RE GONNA DIE!
GET DOWN! GET DOWN! GET DOWN!
Rachel... Rachel you've got to keep it down Rachel!
Rachel! SHUT UP RACHEL! I CAN'T THINK!
WELL, LOOK, I'M DRIVING, DO SOMETHING!!!
This thing, this machine, it crawled out of the ground and started torching everything, just killing everybody.
No, this came from some place else.
That machine, it was already buried.    Ray looks into the sky. What for is unknown.
No, the machine I'm talking about was buried. But, what came down in the lighting storm, what operates it. That's the...
Good.  Hey, what was that thing you did with her?
Yeah, tell me about it, you know?
Listen, I just need you to hold it together for me, okay?
When you start screaming like that, you know, I can't really...
That's where we're going right now.
She's not dead. All right? She's just no here. Okay? They're never here.
Because they are on their way to Boston....
... and so they just kept on going, they're probably up to your grandma's house by now.
Umm.... Because nothing bad happened here. Okay?
So, were safe here. All Right?
Okay, Rachel? This is your area. Okay, you are safe in your area...
Ketchup, Mustard, Ahh, Tabasco, Barbeque Sauce. This is really good Robbie. Vinaigrette. I said pack food. What... What the hell is this?
Ray opens the peanut butter and grabs a wooden spoon from the cooking utensil holder on the counter.
Maybe after we get done eating, I will take you down, teach you how to play some poker. A little five card stud...
You want jelly on this sandwich?
You're not hungry either? Well, that's fine.

Replies.Reply: Okay. You know on the Weather Channel when there's a tornado, and they tell you to go to the basement for safety? It's like that.

Look at me. Look at me.   Rachel and Ray are putting on their coats.

Don't look down, don't look around me. I'm taking you to the car and you're gonna want to look around. But you are not going to, are you?

WILL YOU SHUT UP AND LISTEN?!?!?!
Stop it! Stop it! You gotta stop it! You gotta be quiet or they'll hear you!
They're gonna come back down here!
Do you understand what I'm gonna have to do? I can't let my daughter die because of you.    Harland pays no attention to him.

Let us through. Let us through here.
I never seen anything like this before. That many strikes of lighting in one spot.

Bro, I'm just telling you what that guy said he heard.
Well, there's something down there and it's moving.
Max? Your stupid camera saved your stupid life.

Out there in the pine barrens. We were attached to a National Guard unit, the 83rd Mechanized. They moved to one of those things around midnight. They've got some kind of shield around them. We can't see it, but everything we fire at them detonates too early before we can get close enough to cause any damage. When they flash that thing, everything lights up like Hiroshima.   She begins eating one of the meal packages.
You gotta be kidding me right?

We were feeding New York but New York went dark. So we patched over to D.C., they went down, L.A., Chicago, uplink to London. Even called the affiliates to try and get them to catch the feed, but nobody answered.
That is them. They come down in capsules, riding the lighting into the ground into the machines right?

Replies.Reply: Think about it.    ...    They defeated the greatest power in the world in a couple days. Walked right over us. ....    And these are only the first, they'll keep coming. This is not a war any more than there's a war between men and maggots. This is an extermination.

I been around death plenty. Drive an ambulance in the city. Well, drove and ambulance in the city. That's all over now, huh?    ....   You know the people who make it Ray? The ones that don't flatline before the hospital? It's the ones who keep their eyes open, keep looking at you, keep thinking. ....    There the ones who survive...
We're not going to be exterminated.
It's okay! Come on, I wanna show you something!
We're gonna fight them Ray. They gotta have a weakness. Come on, take a look.    Ray and Harland see two robots spraying vine like strands out of a hole on the bottom of the ship onto the ground.

You miss your mommy? I had a little girl nearly your age. You know, if anything happens to your daddy, I'll take care of you.   Ray is very angry that Harland is saying things like that to his daughter.
What exactly is your plan, Ray? I know what I'm gonna do. How about you? You gonna sit here, wait for them to come get you? Is that your plan?
Maybe you'll be okay. Maybe you'll get lucky and they'll train you as their pet. You know, train you, feed you, teach you how to do tricks...
Then they spray us, like a fertilizer!
Then they spit us out all over their goddamn red weeds!
This tunnel will get us to the city. We'll have our own tunnels there. Ready Made! Subway, see what I'm saying!
You can hide a whole army down there!
We're the resistance Ray! They can't occupy this country! Occupations always fail! History's taught us that a thousand times. This is our land.
... We eat it, we breathe it, only we can live on it! They can't survive here Ray. They weren't built for it.
We got him! Keep pulling! Pull me!
I don't know, something's happening to them. Please keep moving.
Go. Go. Just keep moving, sir.   Ray asks another soldier down the road for information.
Now let's keep moving, don't stop do not stop! Keep moving!
JAVELIN'S THE KEY! LOAD THE GUSTAV, IT'S GONNA BE A TOUGH KILL!!! LET'S GO!!!
LETS GO!!! BRIGN OUT THE JAVELIN!!!
